sub_concepts.name: Kinetic Energy
sub_concepts.definition: The energy possessed by an object due to its motion.

sub_concepts.name: Potential Energy
sub_concepts.definition: The energy possessed by an object due to its position or configuration.

sub_concepts.name: Thermal Energy
sub_concepts.definition: The energy associated with the random motion of particles in a substance.

sub_concepts.name: Electrical Energy
sub_concepts.definition: The energy associated with the movement of electric charge.

sub_concepts.name: Light Energy
sub_concepts.definition: The energy associated with electromagnetic radiation in the visible spectrum.

sub_concepts.name: Sound Energy
sub_concepts.definition: The energy associated with sound waves, or vibrations in a medium.

sub_concepts.name: Chemical Energy
sub_concepts.definition: The energy stored in the bonds of chemical compounds.

sub_concepts.name: Nuclear Energy
sub_concepts.definition: The energy stored in the nucleus of an atom.
